txt.en: Long have the Eldgang dwelt in the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu, ever in the shadow of an imprisoned evil.\n\nNow they face threats from all sides: The chains of Thaurlach are loosing, the Ever-seer and his Nameless horde gather, and Fire-orcs in the service of Mordor seek tools of darkness to use in Sauron's war against the Free Peoples of Middle-earth.
